body_html:
@asimshankar :
Step 1: git clone
Step 2: git checkout tags/0.12.1
Step 3: fix issue #6950 -- so git status will show modified: tensorflow/workspace.bzl
Step 4: ./configure
google cloud: N
HDFS: N
OpenCL: N
CUDA:Y
Other options use default
configure is complete
Step 5: bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

git status:
# Not currently on any branch.
# Changed but not updated:
#   (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
#   (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
#
#	modified:   tensorflow/workspace.bzl
#
no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

BTW： I try pip install tensorflow-gpu, it works! Finally I give up "build from source" .

body:
@asimshankar :
Step 1:  git clone
Step 2: git checkout tags/0.12.1
Step 3: fix issue #6950 -- so git status will show modified:  tensorflow/workspace.bzl
Step 4: ./configure
google cloud: N
HDFS: N
OpenCL: N
CUDA:Y
Other options use default
configure is complete
Step 5:   bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
